message.body: Much better. Diarrhea stopped and vomit. Tummy still hurts. Going to community acupuncture soon. Hope you're having fun!!
So glad to hear!!!! Love you much. We loved watching old family movies and laughing till we cried.
Aw! I wish I were there! I made Juevos rancheros last night. Not as good as El Cerro Grande which I'm craving now!!!
